Key Match Events: Michael Massey hit a three-run homer in the first inning
Gio Urshela homered for the Braves
Matt Olson and Jorge Soler had opportunities to score but were stranded
Post-Match Reflections: Braves manager Brian Snitker acknowledged the significance of the game
Braves would advance to a Division Series matchup at San Diego if they win the doubleheader
Snitker indicated that he would likely make a switch if the Braves locked up a playoff berth in the opener
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heavy rains caused the postponement of two games between the Braves and Mets
The game was part of a doubleheader to make up the postponed games
Spencer Schwellenbach will start the opener of the doubleheader
Chris Sale is slated for the second game of the doubleheader
